description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Tamar Valley, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Tamar Valley Riverside Wine Lovers' Escape
hotels.description: Experience the gourmet food, wine and natural beauty of Tasmania’s Tamar Valley wine region with a riverside escape at Rosevears Hotel, a 30-minute drive from Launceston Airport. Home to sprawling wineries, berry farms and local wildlife, this tranquil part of the world allows you to truly disconnect. Perched on the edge of the Tamar River, this boutique property features just 26 rooms, allowing the attentive staff to offer impeccable service throughout your stay. Head to the hotel’s beer garden and deck to enjoy local wine or beer in front of the cosy log fire, and watch the world go by at the waterfront restaurant. The emphasis here is on fresh local food, with Tasmanian oysters, scallops and market fish on the menu. When you're ready to turn in, head to your cosy room with guaranteed river views from your private balcony.

seo.title: Hôtels à Tamar Valley - Australie Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Tamar Valley, Australia avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
